channel.name: 1- Incomming LIS HL7_DUP
channel.description: Al canal se le han aadido funciones adicionales: 1-. Una funcion que verifica que el campo de range de prueba contenga algun caracter de alfanumerico y omite la transmision si esto es verdadero. 2-. Se aade una funcion que consulta la respuesta obtenida de CDS (almacenada en una tabla response) en envios anteriores utilizando el caseId y la inserta en el JSON.
channel.preprocessingScript: // Modify the message variable below to pre process data return message;

Update Response from RD to FireBird DB

channel.name: 1- Incomming LIS HL7_OLD
channel.description: Channel that receives HL7 messages from GLIMNS types (OML^O21 & OUL^R2), tranforms to CDS JSON Format, sends to CDS de JSON and transforms the response into HL7 message tto Gilms. Steps: Source transformations: 1.- Receive the HL7 message. 2.- Save the original incoming message in a file for tracebility (D:\AlinIQ_CDS8\projects\backup\mirth\incoming) 3.- Dispatch the messages filterig if is an order message (OML) or result message (OUL) 4.- Tranform the HL7 message into JSON format compatible with AlinIQ CDS. 5.- Include the historcal data from the CDS repository. 6.- Update the repository with the new lab results. Destination transformations: 1.- If the message is an order senf to channel Save order Inforamtion. 2.- If it's a results, Send the JSON object to the ALinIQ CDS Server usin a REstful Interface (http://localhost:9023/rdr/interpreter/query?kbcode=) 3.- Receive the response generated by AlinIQ CDS. 4.- Save the response in a file for tracebility (D:\AlinIQ_CDS8\projects\backup\mirth\response) 5.- Transform the JSON response into HL7 message type OML^O21. 6.- Send to Glimns to the address 10.25.68.16:12999
channel.preprocessingScript: // Modify the message variable below to pre process data return message;
